ecr_repository_url.description: ECR repository URL to push images to

acm_certificate_arn.description: ACM certificate ARN for HTTPS listener (same region as ALB).

app_port.description: Container port the Express app listens on.

container_image.description: Container image URI (e.g., <account>.dkr.ecr.<region>.amazonaws.com/repo:tag). If empty, uses the ECR repo created by this stack with tag 'latest'.

enable_codedeploy_bluegreen.description: If true, create CodeDeploy ECS blue/green resources (requires you to deploy via CodeDeploy).

enable_https.description: If true, create HTTPS listener. Requires acm_certificate_arn.

enable_waf.description: Attach AWS WAFv2 managed rules to the ALB.

max_capacity.description: Maximum ECS service tasks for autoscaling.

min_capacity.description: Minimum ECS service tasks for autoscaling.
